topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a46a63636872584c9d0a00#post_54a46a63636872584c9d0a00
I agree here; a massive chunk of people have had parents like that before and I had a similar situation.  I don't think "faggot" will ever be "taken back" and turned into a regular word because the most common use for the word is still a derogatory term.  It'd be like if someone walked up to random woman and said "What's up my whore?" or such thinking it's perfectly fine and acceptable; I highly doubt most women would be happy to be called a whore or slut by random strangers. I know people try to take back the word, but considering that 95% of the time it's still used derogatory it's never going to become just another word.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
So after finishing Fantasy Kaleidoscope episode 4 I feel like breaking out into song.
*Grabs guitar*
"Brother my brother
Tell me what are we fighting for
We've got to end this war
We should love one another
Oh, can't we just pretend this war never began
We can try
Brother my brother
We face each other from different sides
The anger burns can't remember why
It's kind of crazy to cause so much pain
Our foolish pride makes us hate this way-"
